metadata.title: Ballast Water (Invertebrate fauna identified) from 5 BC Ports 1995-97
metadata.description: Data are presented on the invertebrate fauna identified from the ballast water of 63 vessels arriving at 5 B.C.ports between December, 1995 and January, 1997.
keywords: North Inner Coast (QCS, Hecate, Dixon Inlet and passages)
South Inner Coast (Johnstone, Georgia, JDF, inlets and passages)
